description.en: UTXO Global is a DeFi-focused wallet on the Nervos Network (CKB), designed for managing assets on UTXO-based blockchains. It integrates with the RGB++ protocol to enable seamless management and trading of digital assets, such as meme tokens. As the first wallet integrated into Telegram and available as a Chrome extension, it offers batch transfers, cross-platform synchronization, and CKB.Fi integration for minting and trading RGB++ tokens from social content, driving DeFi innovation in the UTXO ecosystem.
description.ch: UTXO Global is a DeFi-focused 钱包 on the Nervos 网络 (CKB), designed for managing assets on UTXO-based 区块链s. It integrates with the RGB++ 协议 to enable seamless management and 交易 of digital assets, such as meme 代币s. As the first 钱包 integrated into Telegram and available as a Chrome extension, it offers batch transfers, cross-platform 同步, and CKB.Fi 集成 for minting and 交易 RGB++ 代币s from social content, driving DeFi innovation in the UTXO 生态系统.

description.en: Pioneers DeFi by being the first wallet integrated into Telegram, enabling seamless asset management within a popular messaging platform
description.ch: Pioneers DeFi by being the first 钱包 integrated into Telegram, enabling seamless asset management within a popular messaging platform

description.en: Manages UTXO-compatible assets using Nervos CKB’s Cell model and RGB++ protocol for secure, flexible handling
description.ch: Manages UTXO-compatible assets using Nervos CKB’s Cell模型 and RGB++ 协议 for secure, flexible handling

description.en: Available as a Chrome extension, providing a convenient and accessible interface for managing UTXO-based assets directly in the browser
description.ch: Available as a Chrome extension, providing a convenient and accessible interface for managing UTXO-based assets directly in the browser (需要专业翻译)

title.en: UTXO Global Multi-Sig Wallet supporting xUDT
title.ch: UTXO Global Multi-Sig 钱包 支持ing xUDT

desc.en: A pioneering universal account protocol crafted to accelerate Web3 mass adoption.
desc.ch: A pioneering universal account 协议 crafted to accelerate Web3 mass adoption.

q.ch: Why is UTXO Global special? (需要专业翻译)

a.en: UTXO Global stands out as the first wallet integrated into Telegram, offering seamless DeFi access within a popular messaging platform. It also operates as a Chrome extension, supports batch transfers, synchronizes across platforms, and integrates with CKB.Fi for minting/trading RGB++ meme tokens, enhancing liquidity and user engagement in the Nervos ecosystem.
a.ch: UTXO Global stands out as the first 钱包 integrated into Telegram, offering seamless DeFi access within a popular messaging platform. It also operates as a Chrome extension, 支持s batch transfers, synchronizes across platforms, and integrates with CKB.Fi for minting/交易 RGB++ meme 代币s, enhancing 流动性 and user engagement in the Nervos 生态系统.

q.ch: What are its main features? (需要专业翻译)

a.en: Enabling seamless asset management across platforms with cross-platform synchronization. It supports multiple UTXO-compatible assets using CKB’s Cell model and RGB++ protocol, facilitates efficient batch transfers through a multisig wallet, integrates with CKB.Fi for minting and trading RGB++ meme tokens from social content, and enhances cross-chain liquidity for Nervos CKB and Fiber networks.
a.ch: Enabling seamless asset management across platforms with cross-platform 同步. It 支持s multiple UTXO-compatible assets using CKB’s Cell模型 and RGB++ 协议, facilitates efficient batch transfers through a multisig 钱包, integrates with CKB.Fi for minting and 交易 RGB++ meme 代币s from social content, and enhances 跨链 流动性 for Nervos CKB and Fiber 网络s.
